clues.clue: A fixture to keep carriage occupants clean
clues.hint: The front board in a carriage to prevent mud "dashed" up by horses from spilling on the passangers. In cars that board got gauges and meters.

clues.clue: Used to measure speed at sea
clues.hint: A piece of wood (log) attached to a line with knots. Tossed over board, the knots are counted in a set time frame. Distance of the rope over time gives speed. The speed was tracked in a book, the log book.
